title: Technical SEO - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Faisal Anderson July 22, 2019 Spying On Google: 5 Ways to Use Log File Analysis To Reveal Invaluable SEO Insights Advanced SEO | Search Engines | Technical SEO Most SEO Professionals have never used Log File Analysis, but without it, they are missing out on unique and invaluable insights that regular crawling tools just can’t produce. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers July 19, 2019 Aren't 301s, 302s, and Canonicals All Basically the Same? - Best of Whiteboard Friday Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | SEO Basics The answer is unequivocally no. In this fan-favorite Whiteboard Friday, Dr. Pete explains how bots and humans experience pages differently depending on which solution you use, why it matters, and how each choice is treated by Google. Read this post By: Benjamin Estes July 5, 2019 How to Make a Technical SEO Recommendation Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | SEO Consulting After you've put in the work with technical SEO and made your discoveries, there's one thing left to do: present your findings to the client and agree on next steps. Benjamin Estes presents his framework for making technical recommendations to clients and stakeholders to best position you for success. Read this post By: Serge Stefoglo June 28, 2019 How to Deliver JSON-LD Recommendations the Easy Way Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | E-Commerce SEO When you work with large clients whose sites comprise thousands (or hundreds of thousands) of pages, it's a daunting task to add the necessary markup. In today's Whiteboard Friday, we welcome Sergey Stefoglo to share his framework for delivering JSON-LD recommendations in a structured and straightforward way. Read this post By: Roger MozBot June 24, 2019 How to Monitor Hreflang Performance With Dynamic Tags in STAT Technical SEO | SEO Analytics | SEO Tools Telling a valuable story about complex code, one that will resonate with clients, is no easy feat. But dynamic tags in STAT help transform all that data into easily digestible narratives. Read this post By: Benjamin Estes June 14, 2019 How to Strategically Think About Technical SEO Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday Have you considered that the way you think about technical SEO could be hindering or helping your success? Ben Estes shares his agency's tried-and-true framework for tackling technical SEO quandaries strategically. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard June 10, 2019 The 61 Best Free SEO Tools [100% Free] SEO Tools | Technical SEO | SEO Basics There are literally hundreds of free SEO tools out there, so we focused on only the best and most useful to add to your toolbox. Read this post By: PJ Howland June 3, 2019 How to Crush Your Competitors With TF-IDF Advanced SEO | Technical SEO | SEO Tools Learn how you can easily apply this technique to your SEO game and see fast results. Read this post By: Tom Bennet May 13, 2019 SEO & Progressive Web Apps: Looking to the Future Advanced SEO | Technical SEO | SEO Tools Until recently, it’s been too easy to get away with not understanding the consequences and opportunities posed by PWAs and service workers. Read this post By: Sam Marsden May 10, 2019 Visualizing Speed Metrics to Improve SEO, UX, & Revenue Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | User Experience (UX) With increasing benefits to SEO, UX, and customer loyalty that inevitably translates to revenue, there are more reasons than ever to both focus on site speed and become adept at communicating its value to devs and stakeholders. Sam Marsden takes us point-by-point through how Google understands speed metrics, the best ways to access and visualize that data, and why it all matters. Read this post By: Brian Gorman May 9, 2019 An SEO’s Guide to Writing Structured Data (JSON-LD) Technical SEO | Advanced SEO | SEO Tools This guide will help you understand JSON-LD and structured data markup. Go beyond the online generators and prepare your web pages for the future of search! Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers May 7, 2019 Can You Reverse A 301 Redirect? Technical SEO | Advanced SEO The short answer is yes. You can reverse a 301 redirect. The long answer is that this change may not work the way you'd expect or hope, and it could make your problems worse. Read this post By: Patrick Curtis April 15, 2019 12 Steps to Lightning Page Speed Technical SEO | SEO Tools Here are 12 steps we've taken to keep our page speed lightening fast and organic traffic healthy. Read this post By: Tomek Rudzki April 2, 2019 How to Diagnose and Solve JavaScript SEO Issues in 6 Steps Technical SEO | Advanced SEO Here are six steps to help you diagnose and solve JavaScript SEO issues. Read this post
